0.1.2.name: wordpress/jet-active-blog-list-ru-edition
0.1.2.description:
Provides a list of blogs sorted by last update (the last activity on the blog) in two columns. Ability to customize the header and the number of blogs in the blog list

no longer supported! completely replaced by this plugin http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/jet-blog-meta-list-2-ru-edition/
